posts.title: Stop It Like A Tour Player
posts.description: Growing up playing junior golf, I was told that a larger grip size would be difficult to rotate and likely lead to a fade..

image.alt: stop it like a tour player 1

posts.title: The Impact of Pistol Grips on Putting
posts.description: Variations of the “pistol-type” putter grip have been part of the game of golf for much longer than one might expect.

image.alt: stop it like a tour player 2
